about_the_game:
This token pack contains a set of modern characters in a variety of professions.

This token pack contains:

  • Female Bartender
  • Female Business Woman
  • Female Demolitionist
  • Female Housewife
  • Female Mad Scientist
  • Female Police Officer
  • Female Prostitute
  • Female Scientist
  • Male Average Joe
  • Male Body
  • Male Business Man
  • Male Detective
  • Male EMT
  • Male Guy on the Town
  • Male Hazmat
  • Male Homeless
  • Male John Does
  • Male Mental Patient
  • Male Outline
  • Male Scientist
  • Male Tough Guy
  • Male Urban Guy

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license. This product should work with all rulesets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
